title: Why the Daybreaker SMP should return
body: The Daybreaker SMP was the highlight of Daybreaker's online career in content creation and as such should return so his full glory might oncemore dominate the internet

title: Looking to start a war
body: Me and my friends recently got full netherite and we want to test our skill in mortal combat. Plus the server's been kinda boring lately soooo
